name: Jordan Benson
text: So when I saw the prices I immediately thought this is going to be cheap like another pizza chain we all know.  But I was pleasantly surprised. The pizza is fantastic and the variety is great.  The salad bar is a little lacking, but the ‚Ä¶More

text: Great fun and games and excellent food. Plus they have Mr. Pibb.

name: Victoria Mando
text: Fun place. Pizza was great. Family friendly. Dad's dream meal and entertainment!

name: Ann Trisel
text: Took my family and daughter there for the first time, and our experience was wonderful!!! The food was very good, especially the cheesy bread! The arcade was a perfect mixture of games for all ages of kids (even little ones which we really ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Walls
text: Wonderful staff! Everyone there was very nice and helpful. I booked a party there and when I arrived they told me about a different party pack I hadn't seen that actually got our kids more stuff for the same price. Staff was very attentive and got us everything we needed for a great party!

name: Saved Stacey
text: Pay attention to your birthday party host!! They are slick! Other than that, not bad.

name: Allison Reinart
text: Kids had a great time and I liked that all of the games were in one area that is easily visible from your table. The pizza was okay, but we went more for the atmosphere than the food.

name: cammy inco
text: I celebrated my daugher's 3rd birthday party there and everyone loved it! Nicole hosted the party and she was AWESOME! She is the best!

name: Kimmy Burns
text: AWESOME place to go to birthday parties or just hang out!! Pizza's are AWESOME & way better than the " RAT " PIZZA PARTY place of "yesteryear!!"  PPP's pizza has flavor & doesn't taste like "box with sauce and cheese"

name: Cowboy Cavalier
text: Brought my family in for lunch today.  We had hands down the best experience ever.  The service was wonderful, the food was delicious, and the staff was awesome.  Thanks we will be back!!!

name: Faithann Basore
text: We had our daughter's 9th birthday party here.  We were pleased with the organization from the staff.  My daughter's friends had a good time and I was happy to have a place to host the party with not a lot of work on my part.

name: Dale Spoonemore
text: We thought this would be a great place to host an end of season party for our soccer team and called to make a reservation last week. However, we showed up today to find that the reservation was never booked. Luckily they had space for us ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff Shelton
text: I enjoyed my experience. The pizza was good sauce was a little tart but it was a great family place. Kids are very welcomed at this establishment. Plenty of games. Similar to Chuck e Cheese. A little expensive for a large family.

name: Kandice Coyle
text: Amity, our party host is AWESOME! With all the excitement of kids birthday parties going on, she remained calm and professional. She made our experience a delightful one! We'll definitely be back.

name: Rashele Shoun
text: I am such a fool for kid places like these! I love it here! The pizza is yummy! The salads are also surprisingly really good! It's a fun place, especially for those who are a kid at heart like me!

name: Bob Blanchette
text: Friendly staff, clean restaurant, fresh pizza served quickly. Kids had fun with the games. Comfortable seating with many options. ‚Ä¶More

name: Bryan Kemp
text: Great new place in moore. Very open floor which makes moving around very easy. Good pizza fresh and fast. Good games for most ages. And let's not forget they serve 6. Beer!! A+!

name: matthew Nichols
text: 3 times i have been to this place for their lunch buffet.  As soon as they open, in the middle of service, and towards the end of the lunch buffet. Each time they had no variety or much pizza out. They make a half pizza of burnt cheese, ‚Ä¶More

name: Austin Robinson
text: Large area for parties or general sitting. Which is great for when there is multiple parties going on, like when we there. Table area was kept clean and noticed all the booths had outlets with two USB ports, nice for electronics. Gamer area ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Badke
text: Went for the lunch buffet. Very disappointed. Would rather do cici's for cheap pizza. When you request water you get a tiny little cup that you drink in two sips. Then the pizzas on the buffet aren't even cut all the way through so you have ‚Ä¶More

name: chuckling charlie
text: I went during the afternoon & had the buffet for $6.49 & they had a great selection. They even had dessert pizza along with regular pizza & salads. Great food

name: Judy Kibler
text: Excellent pizza & salad! Polite staff & clean environment! Gotta' love it ‚ùóüòé

text: Nice clean restaurant with great service.  Pizza was very fresh and crispy.

name: Zeela Snodgrass
text: Had a good experience. 8 year old's b-day party.  Not crowded.  Clean.  Good pizza. Friendly staff. Fun games.

name: Tia Changa
text: Carmela at the toy counter saved my life bc daddy couldn't make it, and mommy can't play a video game worth anything. Armed with very few tickets, my kids still both got exactly what they wanted, and we all went home happy!

name: Cory Babcock
text: Had my son's 3rd bday here today and staff was absolutely amazing. Food is so good too. Highly recommend this place to any one thinking about have a bday party here.

name: Barbara Snook Reinholtz
text: Good pizza. Good SERVICE. Kids LOVED it. Games was a bit.

name: Nick Elliott
text: Lunch buffet was simple but had quality pizza. The salad and dessert options were rather limited.

text: Expensive for a chucky cheese vibe pizza joint. More for the birthday crowds of younger ones. Got a large pizza, boneless wings and 3 drinks and it was 40 bucks. That's just for 3 people, now I'm sure that having twice that would get you a ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Beane
text: Relatively good pizza, better than lil Caesar's and Dominos.  Good spread of pies for their lunch buffet, not just one or two styles.

name: Amanda Moore
text: Ordered Pizza (not buffet) was decent and came out nice and hot. Water cups are tiny. For an adult, it is about two gulps if you have ice in the cup. I wish there was sanitizer available. Even though we didn't visit during the buffet, it is ‚Ä¶More

name: Jen Miller
text: Service was awful. We were there for a birthday party. It took an hour to get the pizza. It was not even busy. They only brought half the food, then had to wait for the rest. The staff was rude when the mother complained about the poor service and missing food at her child's birthday party.

name: Joesph Phillips
text: Games are pricey and limited.  They do have gluten free pizza choices though, and it was clean and friendly staff.

name: tim ray
text: This was our 5th trip in about 2 weeks super happy with service and food the staff is super nice food is gredat manager is awesome she is always cheerful will never go back to cicis pizza or Chuck e cheese we will always return here

name: vladymir Hernandez
text: Great place to celebrate kids birthday parties, low price, better than chuck e cheese.

name: Alexandra Clement
text: The pizza was awesome but 70 percent of the games were broken. 5 broke in the time we were there. They said their techs weren't there and are out of town. Basically the ones that were working were the ones that don't give tickets they are just avaliable for entertainment.

name: Katherine Brown
text: Great place. Good food and famiky entertainment

name: Clifton Martinez
text: It was inexpensive, the kids had fun playing games and the pizza was hot

name: C Street
text: Such a fun and safe place for the whole family! Friendly staff is always a plus.

name: Mark Johnson
text: Food was pretty good, but expensive. Kids loved playing.  Large eating area with lots of room to move around. Wait staff was helpful and friendly.

name: Sean Sampson
text: Never heard of this place until my wife and I went to best buy tonight and it happened to be in the same shopping center. We like trying new places so we thought why not we have our son with us so it might be a good change up from our ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeremiah Delay
text: I work here and can confirm how everything is fresh, we make our dough every day, all vegetables and appetizers are prepared daily and never frozen, we strive to give every guest an excellent experience, this place isn't the cheapest but I can tell you it is worth it.

name: Sonja White
text: Very good pizza, affordable, and family friendly! Plenty of seating available.

name: Shirley Certain
text: Great family place reasonably priced
